［深層ニュース］基金設立案「韓国世論の反発予想」…奥薗准教授

06 Nov 2019, 14:33

　浅野豊美・早稲田大教授と奥薗秀樹・静岡県立大准教授、崔鳳泰（チェボンテ）弁護士が６日、ＢＳ日テレの「深層ＮＥＷＳ」に出演し、韓国人元徴用工問題について議論した。
　韓国の文喜相（ムンヒサン）国会議長が明らかにした基金設立案について、奥薗氏は「韓国世論の反発が予想される」と指摘した。崔氏は「歴史を直視し、未来志向的に解決するとの基本原則は賛成できる」と語った。浅野氏は「法的責任ではなく、道義的な責任として日本は自主的な支援が必要」と述べた。

[Deep News] Fund Establishment Proposal “Korean Public Opposition Expectations”… Associate Professor Okuta

06 Nov 2019, 14:33

Toyomi Asano, University of Waseda, Hideki Okuda, Associate Professor of Shizuoka Prefectural University, and Lawyer Chebonte appeared on BS NTV's “Depth NEWS” on the 6th to discuss the issue of Korean recruitment.
Mr. Okusu pointed out that “the Korean public opinion is expected to rebound” regarding the fund establishment proposal revealed by the Korean Parliamentary Minister Munhisan. “We can agree with the basic principle of looking at history and solving it in a future-oriented way,” said Sakaki. Asano said, “Japan needs voluntary support as a moral responsibility, not a legal responsibility.”
